trans-unit.source: Use sample experiments to create new experiments | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use sample experiments to create new experiments | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Create new Azure Machine Learning experiments from sample experiments and experiments shared by the community.
trans-unit.target: Create new Azure Machine Learning experiments from sample experiments and experiments shared by the community.

trans-unit.source: Use sample experiments to create new experiments
trans-unit.target: Use sample experiments to create new experiments

trans-unit.source: When you want to create an experiment, look for examples in Machine Learning team sample experiments and experiments shared by the Machine Learning community.
trans-unit.target: When you want to create an experiment, look for examples in Machine Learning team sample experiments and experiments shared by the Machine Learning community.

trans-unit.source: You also can ask questions or post comments about experiments in the [Gallery](http://gallery.azureml.net/)
trans-unit.target: You also can ask questions or post comments about experiments in the [Gallery](http://gallery.azureml.net/)

trans-unit.source: Browse the Gallery
trans-unit.target: Browse the Gallery

trans-unit.source: Go to the [Gallery](http://gallery.azureml.net/)
trans-unit.target: Go to the [Gallery](http://gallery.azureml.net/)

trans-unit.source: Browse either by going to **Trending Experiments** or **Microsoft samples**.
trans-unit.target: Browse either by going to **Trending Experiments** or **Microsoft samples**.

trans-unit.source: Use search and filters to narrow results:
trans-unit.target: Use search and filters to narrow results:

trans-unit.source: Click an experiment to learn more about it.
trans-unit.target: Click an experiment to learn more about it.

trans-unit.source: To run and/or modify the experiment, click **Open in Studio**.
trans-unit.target: To run and/or modify the experiment, click **Open in Studio**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in with your Microsoft account credentials.
trans-unit.target: Sign in with your Microsoft account credentials.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have a Machine Learning workspace yet, a free trial workspace is created.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have a Machine Learning workspace yet, a free trial workspace is created.

trans-unit.source: [Learn what’s included in the Machine Learning free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/machine-learning/)
trans-unit.target: [Learn what’s included in the Machine Learning free trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/machine-learning/)

trans-unit.source: Use as template in Studio
trans-unit.target: Use as template in Studio

trans-unit.source: Sign in with your Microsoft account credentials to the [Studio](https://studio.azureml.net), and then click **New*** to create a new experiment
trans-unit.target: Sign in with your Microsoft account credentials to the [Studio](https://studio.azureml.net), and then click **New*** to create a new experiment

trans-unit.source: Browse through the Sample content, and pick one to use as a template.
trans-unit.target: Browse through the Sample content, and pick one to use as a template.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Prepare your data
trans-unit.target: Prepare your data

trans-unit.source: Try using R in your experiment
trans-unit.target: Try using R in your experiment

trans-unit.source: Review sample R experiments
trans-unit.target: Review sample R experiments

trans-unit.source: Create an web service API
trans-unit.target: Create an web service API

trans-unit.source: Browse ready-to-use applications
trans-unit.target: Browse ready-to-use applications

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
